tuv.seg: Fundamental Rights under the Irish Constitution
Bunchearta faoi Bhunreacht na hÉireann
The Irish Constitution recognises and declares that you have certain fundamental personal rights
Deir an Bunreacht go bhfuil bunchearta pearsanta ar leith agat agus tugann sé aitheantas dóibh
These are confirmed and protected by the Constitution
Is cearta iad seo a bhaineann leis an gcine daonna, is cearta nádúrtha daonna iad agus dearbhaíonn an Bunreacht iad agus tugann sé cosaint dóibh
This document is in: Government in Ireland > Irish Constitution
This document is in: Rialtas in Éirinn > Bunreacht na hÉireann
This document describes how laws are made by the Oireachtas (the Irish parliament)
Déantar cuir síos anseo ar conas a dhéanann an tOireachtas dlíthe
This document is in: Government in Ireland > National government > Houses of the Oireachtas
This document is in: Rialtas in Éirinn > Rialtas Náisiúnta na hÉireann > Tithe an Oireachtais
The fundamental laws of the European Union are set out in the Treaties
Tá bundlíthe nó rialacha Aontas na hEorpa (AE) leagtha síos i gconarthaí
Find out how the institutions of the EU also have the power to make new laws
Faigh amach tuilleadh faoin chumhacht reachtaíochta nua ag institiúidí an AE
This document is in: Government in Ireland > European government > EU Law
This document is in: Rialtas in Éirinn > Rialtas Eorpach > Dlí an AE
Appealing rights under EU law
Cearta achomhairc faoi dlí na hEorpa
An outline of how your rights are safeguarded under EU law and the various European institutions involved
Cur síos ar an mbealach le cearta an duine a chosaint faoi dlí an AE agus na hinstitiúidí Eorpacha eagsúla a bhaineann leis
This document is in: Government in Ireland > European government > EU Law
This document is in: Rialtas in Éirinn > Rialtas Eorpach > Dlí an AE
Access to Garda records
Rochtain ar thaifid na nGardaí
Under data protection legislation you have the right to access personal information which the Gardaí hold on you, except in certain circumstances
Faoi reachtaíocht cosanta sonraí tá an ceart agat rochtain a fháil ar shonraí pearsanta atá á gcoinneáil ag na Gardaí fút, ach amháin i gcúinsí áirithe
Find out how to access your information
Faigh amach conas rochtain a fháil ar do chuid faisnéise
Irish Human Rights and Equality Commission
Coimisiún na hÉireann um Chearta an Duine agus Comhionannas
The Commission promotes and protects human rights and equality
Déanann an Coimisiún cearta an duine agus comhionannas a chur chun cinn agus a chosaint
In some cases, it can assist you to further human rights issues by assisting with legal proceedings
I roinnt cásanna, féadfaidh an Coimisiún cabhrú leat chun saincheisteanna chearta an duine a chur chun cinn nó trí chabhrú leat le himeachtaí dlí
Judicial review of public decisions
Athbhreithniú Breithiúnach ar Chinntí Poiblí
Public decisions may be judicially reviewed by the High Court to determine whether they are illegal
Is féidir leis an Ard-Chúirt athbhreithniú breithiúnach a dhéanamh ar chinntí poiblí le dearbhú an bhfuil siad neamhdhleathach
Find out how to initiate judicial review proceedings
Faigh amach conas imeachtaí athbhreithnithe bhreithiúnaigh a thionscnamh
This document is in: Government in Ireland > National government > Standards and accountability
This document is in: Rialtas in Éirinn > Rialtas Náisiúnta na hÉireann > Caighdeáin agus Cuntasacht

Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Dlí"

Alcól agus an dlí
